titles.title: Once I Stood In Condemnation (familiar tune ea

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Once I stood in condemnation Waiting thus the sinner's doom Christ in death has wrought salvartion God has raised Him From the tomb Once I was to God a stranger Filled with enmity and fear He has rescued me from danger Love reveal'd and bro't me near He has rescued me from danger Love reveal'd and bro't me near{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now I see in Christ's acceptance But the measure of my own He who lay beneath my sentence Seated high upon the Throne Quickened raised and in Him seated I a full deliverance know Every foe has been defeated Every enemy laid low Every foe has been defeated Every enemy laid low Now I have a life in union With the risen Lord above Now I drink in Sweet communion Some rich foretaste of His Love Soon O Lord in highest glory All it's vastness I'll explore Soon I'll cast my crown Before Thee While I worship and adore Soon I'll cast my crown Before Thee While I worship and adore{/lang-eng}
